targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

IF ${LRA:doublequote} = "NDR"
THEN 
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM Piano.total_visits 
WHERE  site_level2 IN ('$NDR_all')  
AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1" 
AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID" 
AND $Zeitraum
;
ELSE
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 IN('mdr.de','Jump')
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND distribution IN ('$MDR_all')
  AND $Zeitraum
;
END IF

IF ${LRA:doublequote} = "NDR"
THEN 
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM Piano.total_visits 
WHERE  site_level2 IN ('$NDR_all')  
AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1" 
AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID" 
AND $Vergleichszeitraum
;
ELSE
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS summe
FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 IN('mdr.de','Jump')
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND distribution IN ('$MDR_all')
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
;
END IF

IF ${LRA:doublequote} = "NDR" THEN WITH past_value as(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits, 0)) as past_sum
  FROM
    Piano.total_visits
  WHERE
    site_level2 IN ('$NDR_all')
    AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
    AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
    AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
    AND $Vergleichszeitraum
),
current_value AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits, 0)) as current_sum
  FROM
    Piano.total_visits
  WHERE
    site_level2 IN ('$NDR_all')
    AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
    AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
    AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
    AND $Zeitraum
)
SELECT
  ((current_sum - past_sum) / past_sum) * 100
FROM
  current_value,
  past_value as relative_difference;
ELSE
WITH past_value as(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits, 0)) as past_sum
  FROM
    ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
  WHERE
    site_level2 IN('mdr.de','Jump')
    AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
    AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
    AND distribution IN ('$MDR_all')
    AND $Vergleichszeitraum
),
current_value AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_visits, 0)) as current_sum
  FROM
    ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
  WHERE
    site_level2 IN('mdr.de', 'Jump')
    AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
    AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
    AND distribution IN ('$MDR_all')
    AND $Zeitraum
)
SELECT
  ((current_sum - past_sum) / past_sum) * 100
FROM
  current_value,
  past_value as relative_difference
;
END IF

SELECT
   TIMESTAMP(date),sum(m_visits) as N_Joy_Heute
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = 'n-joy-app'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY date

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), sum(m_visits)
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = 'n-joy-app'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
GROUP BY date

  AND distribution IN ('app_mdraktuell_ios','app_mdraktuell_android')
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
  GROUP BY date

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP(date), sum(m_visits) as sum_sh_app
FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 = 'mdr.de'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND distribution IN ('app_mdrsachsen_ios','app_mdrsachsen_android')
  AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY date

SELECT
DATE_ADD(TIMESTAMP(date), INTERVAL $time_shift DAY), sum(m_visits) as sum_sh_app_yesterday FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 = 'mdr.de'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND distribution IN ('app_mdrsachsen_ios','app_mdrsachsen_android')
  AND $Vergleichszeitraum
  GROUP BY date

  TIMESTAMP(date), sum(m_visits) as sum_ndrinfo_app
FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 = 'mdr.de'

  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"

GROUP BY date

  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app
WHERE site_level2 = 'mdr.de'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND distribution IN ('app_mdrthueringen_ios','app_mdrthueringen_android')

  TIMESTAMP(date), sum(m_visits) as sum_kultur_app
FROM
  ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.MDR_total_visits_app

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "Gestern"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "Gestern vor 7 Tagen"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "Vorletztes Wochenende"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "Letzte 8-14 Tage"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "Letzte 31-60 Tage"
  END

SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
  WHEN "Gestern" THEN "date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 8 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letztes Wochenende" THEN "date >= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY),INTERVAL 7 DAY) as saturday) AND date <= (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) as sunday)"
  WHEN "Letzte 7 Tage" THEN "date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)"
  WHEN "Letzte 30 Tage" THEN "date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  60 DAY) AND date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY)"
  END

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
ORDER BY LRA ASC

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END

SELECT distinct app FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY app ASC

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'MDR' THEN
      (SELECT distinct product_app_name FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
    WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN 
      (SELECT distinct site_level2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles_App` WHERE app = "$App")
  END

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday)
date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()
date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Heute : date = CURRENT_DATE(), Gestern : date = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  date >= (SELECT saturday FROM(SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) as saturday)) AND date <= (SELECT DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\,WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) as sunday), Letzte 7 Tage : date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : date >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND date < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE "${Zeitraum:text}"
  WHEN "Heute" THEN "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_today"
  ELSE "ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_daily"
END
